page.title: 11Sport.
page.content: Our area has a variety of Sports facilities.Caedelyn Fields and the grounds of Whitchurch Hospital provide residents with football,rugby,cricket, bowls and tennis facilities.The competitive spirit is fostered through competitions between local teams in most sports.A golf course occupies a large part of the area.It is one of the few in the area and so people journey quite a distance to play there.There is not a single leisure centre in our area.People living in the area have to travel considerable distances to swim.The pool at Radyr Comprehensive is open both at weekends and evenings for local use.Local schools compete at football,mini-rugby cricket and baseball.Whitchurch High School is the base for a local junior running club.
